entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
